rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You helped our big brother out a lot,
didn't you? We're so grateful!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0002
rows.name: Thanks so much for helping us!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't think we'd have been
reunited if it weren't for you.

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, it's such a relief that Da
came back...

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0005
rows.name:
We've been playing this game that
our big bro sent us together and it's
super fun!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Ahh, when's Da going to be back?
I really want us all to play the game
that our big bro sent us!

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I know my brother said my da did
some bad things, and that he won't
be back for a long time...

rows.label: tlk41100152_03_msg0008
rows.name:
But even if it takes years, or
even decades, I still hope it'll
all work out...
